statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT sales_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE demand_forecast <= 50;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_id ASC, sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, demand_forecast FROM sales_data WHERE demand_forecast < 500 ORDER BY sales_date ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id, sales_date HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT sales_date, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY sales_date HAVING avg_sales < 1000 ORDER BY sales_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_sales;
SELECT product_id, sale_date FROM product_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM product_sales GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM product_sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_sale_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM product_sales WHERE product_id = 1 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM product_sales GROUP BY product_id;

SELECT product_id, product_sales.sale_date, forecast_date, forecast_value FROM product_sales LEFT JOIN product_forecast ON product_sales.product_id = product_forecast.product_id AND product_sales.sale_date = product_forecast.forecast_date;
SELECT product_id, MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM product_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, AVG(forecast_value) AS average_forecast_value FROM product_forecast GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY average_forecast_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, quantity ASC, amount DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT forecast_id, product_id, forecast_date, demand_estimate FROM demand_forecast WHERE confidence_level > 0.8
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand_estimate > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity, amount, product_name, category FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_date, quantity, amount FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT forecast_date, estimated_demand FROM Forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Product GROUP BY category;

SELECT Customer.customer_name, Sales.sale_date, Product.product_name, Sales.quantity, Sales.amount FROM Customer JOIN Sales ON Customer.customer_id = Sales.sale_id JOIN Product ON Sales.product_id = Product.product_id;
SELECT Product.product_name, SUM(Forecast.estimated_demand) AS total_demand FROM Product JOIN Forecast ON Product.product_id = Forecast.product_id GROUP BY Product.product_name;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM historical_sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT rep_id, rep_name, region FROM sales_rep WHERE region='West' ORDER BY rep_name;
SELECT forecast_id, predicted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT rep_name, region, hire_date FROM sales_rep WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY hire_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5
